lines: *sigh* I'm so booooored...
When will I be able to take my revenge...
Two years ago, I was the King of Hell...
It was fun...
I tortured people and my servants lived in fear of my wrath...
Until Tim came along...
Byle the King of Hell, your reign of terror is over !
Oh really ? Ha Ha Ha Ha
And how will you do that ?
I worked with some friends to make you a little... surprise...
I, The Almighty TIM ! Call upon thee the powers of Death, Earth and Ice !
Banish this wretched soul from our realm ! Condemn him to eternal damnation in... The Human World !
NOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOoooooooooooooooooo
I was cast out of my kingdom...
I flew during ten days straight, all the way to the Human World.
Every day getting weaker than the last...
Until the crash... When I met Him...
A Fire Elemental here ?
Quick, get into this orb before touching the Water.
Since then, I've been waiting on the Wizard 's desk.
He's been gathering pieces for me to get back to my world...
There's just one thing left to do... ACTIVATE IT !
I, Byle, Ancient King of Hell, call upon thee : Demonic Fire !
Come to me ! Open the gates that will allow me to get back my Kingdom !
FINALLY !!!
I'm still not able to go back in one warp. But I'll get better with every jump !
Let's go find this traitor !
It seems that I have enough power now...
Should I try summoning... It ?
Water Elemental ! I summon thee !
WHO DARES TO SUMMON ME, THE ALL POWERFUL EMPEROR OF THE SEA ?!
Hello Tracy. Remember Me ?
Oh ! Hi Byle how have you been ?
*mutters*Tim, do you hear me ? Please Invoke me back...
No need to call that demon. He will not hear you here.
You are now in MY REALM ! Forget about leaving...
I'M SO SORRY !!
Tim threatened my life ! I couldn't fight back... I didn't want to betray you...
Ever since, I've been regretting my actions...
Well, that's a good thing, because you are now MINE !
If you ever think of betraying me again, I'LL EXTINGUISH YOU !
Yes My Lord ! Sorry My Lord !
